TITLE: Crypto exchange FTX quietly shops for brokerage start-ups amid move into stock trading, sources say
SUMMARY: FTX has been on the hunt to buy brokerage start-ups as the crypto exchange moves into stock trading and its CEO takes a stake in Robinhood, sources say.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts see these stocks as long-term winners
SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Peloton and Rivian.

TITLE: The CEO of the world's second-largest alternatives firm is optimistic about a light recession
SUMMARY: Bruce Flatt, CEO of Brookfield Asset Management, talked about inflation, the energy transition and Elon Musk.

TITLE: Rising fuel costs are a massive problem for business and consumers — Here's why they're so high
SUMMARY: Consumers are grappling with record high gas prices, but the surge is also hurting businesses.

TITLE: Crypto exchange FTX U.S. moves into stock trading
SUMMARY: The U.S. affiliate of crypto exchange FTX said Thursday it plans to roll out zero-commission stock trading.

TITLE: Melvin Capital says it's winding down funds and returning money to investors during market turmoil
SUMMARY: Melvin Capital, the hedge fund crushed last year after betting against GameStop, said it will unwind its funds and return cash to investors.

TITLE: Tough questions await SEC Chair Gensler as he seeks funding for his regulatory agenda
SUMMARY: The head of the Securities and Exchange Commission will likely encounter questions from several House members who aren’t happy with his regulatory agenda.

TITLE: Paramount shares jump 15% after Buffett's Berkshire reveals new stake
SUMMARY: Berkshire bought 68.9 million shares of Paramount to build a stake worth $2.6 billion as of the end of March, according to a regulatory filing released Monday.

TITLE: Citigroup shares jump 7% after Warren Buffett reveals a near $3 billion stake in the struggling bank
SUMMARY: A filing revealed that Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway added more than 55 million shares to build a stake worth $2.95 billion as of the end of March.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs gives senior managers a new perk: 'Flexible vacation’ policy
SUMMARY: The perk for managing directors and partners is similar to flexible vacation policies at technology companies including Netflix and LinkedIn.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts say these stocks are extremely undervalued
SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Costco & Cigna.

TITLE: Robinhood shares jump 25% after crypto CEO Sam Bankman-Fried acquires stake
SUMMARY: Robinhood shares jumped 25% after the CEO of a major crypto exchange took a stake in the retail investing app Thursday.

TITLE: Heavily shorted online used car seller Carvana surges nearly 25%, is halted several times
SUMMARY: Shares of online used car retailer Carvana surged Thursday amid a wild trading session.

TITLE: MicroStrategy's bitcoin bet looks shaky as crypto market encounters turbulence
SUMMARY: MicroStrategy, which has bet big on bitcoin over the past two years, is now underwater on its holdings of the world's largest cryptocurrency.

TITLE: Retail investors are continuing to buy the dip in tech despite recent turmoil, says TD Ameritrade
SUMMARY: Retail investors have continued to buy the dip in the recent market turmoil, liking tech despite the sector rout, according to TD Ameritrade's AJ Kahling.

TITLE: Grayscale tells SEC that turning biggest bitcoin fund into ETF will unlock $8 billion for investors
SUMMARY: A spot-based bitcoin ETF has eluded the industry for over five years. With an SEC deadline coming up, will Grayscale finally break through?

TITLE: SoFi stock falls after fintech firm accidentally releases first-quarter report early
SUMMARY: SoFi blamed the early release of its results on human error, according to CNBC's Kate Rooney.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs is shrinking its SPAC business amid regulatory crackdown and market turmoil
SUMMARY: Goldman is scaling back its business in SPACs as blank check deals got caught in a double whammy of a regulatory crackdown and a tough market environment.

TITLE: How Elliott Associates' proposal to split two businesses at Western Digital may build value
SUMMARY: The activist investor said Western Digital’s share price may go up if it separates its NAND flash memory business.

TITLE: Luna Foundation Guard further bolsters stablecoin reserve by raising $1.5 billion in bitcoin
SUMMARY: The Luna Foundation Guard has acquired another $1.5 billion in bitcoin for its UST reserve through an OTC sale of luna, its governance token.

TITLE: Elon Musk and Cathie Wood knock passive index investing, saying it’s gone too far
SUMMARY: Elon Musk and Cathie Wood took aim at index funds, arguing that passive investments have controlled too big a percentage of the stock market.

TITLE: Despite the Fed’s big rate boost, most banks will still pay paltry interest rates
SUMMARY: The cost of money is rising for borrowers. So why aren't savers being rewarded?
